caption.p: The mean particle sizes ( d 32, μm) ( a); delta back scattering (ΔBS) values (%) and ΔBS(t) rates (%/h) of creaming layer ( b); and clarification layer ( c) of the emulsified oils in digestion fluid. Statistical differences are indicated by different letters ( a, b) where significant differences were detected ( p < 0.05). Abbreviation: SBO, soybean oil; PGO, pomegranate seed oil; PHY, physical blend; IO, interesterified oil.
